title: "AI Weekly: AI research still has a reproducibility problem"
excerpt: "QMIX is a popular algorithm that implements CTDE, and many research groups claim to have designed QMIX algorithms that perform well on difficult benchmarks. But a new paper claims that these algorithms’ improvements might only be the result of code optimizations or “tricks” rather than design innovations."
